name: Piotr Limanowski
about: A pragmatic software engineering professional with creative talent, analytical abilities, great people skills and passion. I have always been an appreciated team worker and eager to work in new technologies new-experience-seeker. Above all I am a paying attention to detail open-source enthusiast and commiter.

jobs.description:
Design and development of banking middleware services based on Java EE stack. Legacy integration and facade development.
Notable projects: automated file delivery services, 3rd party customer web APIs, DDD-based customer data processing, rating APIs.

Development of integration solutions in Java EE stack with Oracle Middleware toolkit.
 Notable projects: legacy integration solutions, internal tools for data management.

Development of scalable, highly available, data integration, processing and analysis tools for education sector based on Spring Core stack.
 Notable projects: Real time batch-data processing and analysis tool.

Design and development of face recognition and photo manipulation service. Mobile soft-ware development for social networking applications. Scalable web platform development.
 Notable projects: face recognition, photo manipulation and mobile web applications.

schools.name: Gdansk University of Technology - ETI Faculty
schools.description: MA thesis: “Face Recognition in the crowd using high resolution camera image”

schools.name: 2nd High School in Olsztyn
schools.description: Tech profile: Maths, Physics, Computer Science

competencies.name: Java EE Stack
competencies.description: Weblogic, EJB, JMS, WS, JPA, Maven
